O

onError(ErrorEvent) - Method in interface com.al.amf.remoting.RemoteListener
Displays the result of the unsuccessful call of the remote procedure call when the response from server results in some error.
onResult(ResultEvent) - Method in interface com.al.amf.remoting.RemoteListener
Displays the result of the successful remote procedure call.

R

RemoteListener - Interface in com.al.amf.remoting
Provides an interface for the client to be able to listen events that take place at the server.
RemoteObject - Interface in com.al.amf.remoting
The RemoteObject component lets you access stateless and stateful Java objects that are in the LiveCycle Data Services ES, BlazeDS, or ColdFusion web application's source path.
ResultEvent - Class in com.al.amf.events
Stores the data of the successful remote procedure call.
